properties.description: I had a brief 8 month stint working at ESPN in 2012-13. The job was a temporary part-time position. However, it made me pack up my bags and leave my life in Los Angeles to start my career on the eastern seaboard.
properties.title: ESPN Job

properties.description: 13 years after my parents moved to Los Angeles, I was born. I lived in the suburb of La Crescenta for 18 years before moving to Boston for college. After one year at Northeastern, I transferred back to LA to complete my education at USC.
properties.title: My Birthplace

properties.description: I am Armenian. My ancestors are from Armenia. Armenia did not have its own independent country until the Soviet Union fell so many Armenians were scattered around in the Caucus and the Middle East.
properties.title: Ancestral Origins
